name: DIY Awards
description: DIY Awards is an online trophy store whi
overview:
DIY Awards is an online trophy store which offers customers a better & informed award buying experience. You can easily relate the generic crystal awards and plaques to your specific recognition need with our extensive online samples. The recognition award ideas are categorized by recognition occasions as well as professions for easy browsing: employee recognition, years of service celebration, retirement plaques and awards, outstanding sales achievement, teachers awards, pastor appreciation gifts, etc.

As an online trophy store, we make it easier for you to customize the award, just the way you like it, with our online personalization wizard. In addition, deep-etch crystal engraving and logo set-ups are always offered free of charge. So, you won’t have to worry about those hidden charges.

We understand the importance of recognizing or showing your appreciation as immediately as possible after the event or action you want to point out. We offer standard five business day services nationwide. Rush service is available at slightly higher prices.
